| Property        | Attribute        | Description           | Type                   | Default     |
| --------------- | ---------------- | --------------------- | ---------------------- | ----------- |
| `endAngle`      | `end-angle`      | End angle (degrees)   | `number`               | `135`       |
| `label`         | `label`          | Label                 | `string \| undefined`  | `undefined` |
| `max`           | `max`            | Maximum value         | `number`               | `100`       |
| `min`           | `min`            | Minimum value         | `number`               | `0`         |
| `segments`      | --               | Segments/zones        | `ErxGaugeSegment[]`    | `[]`        |
| `shouldAnimate` | `should-animate` | Animate on change     | `boolean`              | `true`      |
| `showMinMax`    | `show-min-max`   | Show min/max labels   | `boolean`              | `true`      |
| `showValue`     | `show-value`     | Show value            | `boolean`              | `true`      |
| `size`          | `size`           | Gauge size            | `"lg" \| "md" \| "sm"` | `'md'`      |
| `startAngle`    | `start-angle`    | Start angle (degrees) | `number`               | `-135`      |
| `unit`          | `unit`           | Unit label            | `string \| undefined`  | `undefined` |
| `value`         | `value`          | Current value         | `number`               | `0`         |
| `width`         | `width`          | Custom width          | `number \| undefined`  | `undefined` |
